ingredients.ingredient: 3 (6 ounce) packages garlic and herb couscous mix (or any flavor you prefer)
1 pint cherry tomatoes, cut in half
1 (5 ounce) jar pitted kalamata olives, halved
1 cup mixed bell peppers (green, red, yellow, orange), diced
½ cup Greek vinaigrette salad dressing

cookingTips: Cook couscous according to package directions and spread on sheet to cool quickly
Prepare vegetables while couscous cools to save time
Toss salad with dressing just before serving to keep vegetables fresh and couscous fluffy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user in cooking fluffy couscous and combining fresh Mediterranean vegetables with proper proportions for a crowd-pleasing salad.
